headline: Accenture Boss Julie Sweet's Simple Question Determines Who Gets Hired—And It's Not About AI Skills
summary: In today's job market, mastering AI skills might seem like the golden ticket to getting hired. But at tech consultancy Accenture (NYSE:ACN), CEO Julie Sweet relies on a surprisingly simple question to spot top talent. And no, it has nothing to do with AI expertise. headline: Dividend Champion, Contender, And Challenger Highlights: Week Of April 6
